Job Description

Job Description

Key Account Manager – Aerospace Sales (REMOTE)

Work for an exciting and soon to be growing Aerospace & Defense Hardware Solutions Company in Southern California. With a great leadership team, incredible employee appreciation– look what we have to offer you!

Pay: 90,000 - $110,000 per year to start (possible commission depending on experience).

Location: REMOTE! You can also do in person if you live new Compton, CA.

Company Profile

  • Leader in precision fasteners since 1954 and an approved supplier for major organizations including Boeing, Gulfstream, Pratt and Whitney, and the Department of Defense.
  • With over 70 years of experience, we are one of the largest stocking distributors of military spec rivets on the West Coast. of mil-spec, flight, high strength, and specialty print fasteners available for same-day shipping.
  • A place where employees can achieve personal and professional growth and satisfaction.

Features And Benefits

  • Fully Remote Option
  • Competitive pay and commission rewards
  • Medical, Dental and Vision plans, paid vacation and paid holidays.
  • 401K matching

The Role You Will Play

The Key Account Manager will be responsible for maintaining and expanding relationships with our customers in the fasteners industry. This role includes sourcing fastener-related products, assisting in the sales of our SI bolt brand, and achieving sales goals.

If this sounds like a fit, then we are looking forward to hearing from you!

Key Responsibilities Include

  • Customer Relationship Management: Maintain strong relationships with existing customers and develop new customer accounts. Regularly communicate with customers to understand their needs and ensure their requirements are met.
  • Sales and Sourcing: Source and procure fastener-related products to meet customer specifications. Assist in the sales of our SI bolt brand by understanding product lines and providing effective solutions.
  • Account Growth: Revive dormant and slow-growing accounts while actively seeking opportunities to expand the customer base. Identify and pursue new business opportunities.
  • Problem Solving: Address and resolve any issues related to customer orders, including locating specialized items and ensuring timely delivery.

Key Objectives

  • Grow and manage the current customer base.
  • Engage dormant and slow-growing customers.
  • Add and procure new accounts.
  • Understand and sell our custom SI bolt products effectively.

Background Profile

Must haves:

  • 5+ years of experience in fastener sales and the fasteners industry.
  • Familiarity with MILSPEC, NAS, aerospace fasteners, and rivets.
  • Proven track record in managing and growing accounts.
  • Experience in selling industrial parts components such as fasteners, nuts, bolts, and electronic components is a plus.

Nice To Haves

  • Over 10 years in the fasteners industry.
  • Extensive knowledge of mil-spec fasteners and rivets.
  • Established relationships with major defense, government, or airline customers.
  • A desire to grow with our organization.
